title: Cordelia Underwood: Or, The Marvelous Beginnings of the Moosepath League
description: Set during the summer of 1896 on the coast of Maine, a picaresque yarn follows lovely redhead Cordelia Underwood on a quest for her inheritance, which places her in the company of the jolly, Dickensian founders of the Moosepath League. Reprint.
author: Van Reid
